MS MCQs

    Build forms and optimize form performance in Finance and Operations apps

    »

    1. When developing a new form for Finance and Operations apps, is it true that applying a form pattern is a mandatory step?

      Yes

      No


    2. When all requirements for a form pattern have been satisfied, what must be done before you can build and preview the form in a browser window?

      Run the forms pattern report.

      Check the form statistics add-in.

      Set the form that you want to preview as the startup object for the project.

      Perform a rebuild of the form.


    3. You want to attach a report to a menu item so the report will display when a user selects the menu item. Which type of menu item should be used to perform the task?

      Display menu item

      Output menu item

      Action menu item

      Window menu item
